item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1428; 05:56PM; 525 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ILO2Fc; #VermontKnolls; Firefighters contained the flames to just one attic in the one-story row of commercial occupancies. It took 36 LAFD firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the flames, without injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM22 E15 E221 E233 E264 E266 E33 E64 EM13 RA57 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 T66; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1428; 05:37PM; 525 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ILO2Fc; Vermont Knolls; One-story row of commercials with fire in the attic of at least one unit. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM22 E15 E221 E233 E264 E266 E33 E64 EM13 RA57 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
Automobile Fire; INC#0170; 02:38AM; 3445 N Marmion Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zc8iNc; Cypress Park; a; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; E44; CH7; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1342; 06:34PM; 12201 Canyon Hill Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ckOXjM; #Sylmar; PRELIM: Solo vehicle into the rear of a one-story home. The briefly-trapped driver (unknown age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances) has been freed from the wreckage of their vehicle, and is being medically assessed by LAFD Paramedics. All occupants of the home are accounted for, and none have sustained injury. First arriving LAFD firefighters, including those specially trained and equipped in Urban Search and Rescue, will remain at the scene to assure safety and stabilize the residence, pending arrival of an inspector from the City's Department of Building & Safety (ETA 8:00 PM). Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3239); FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E298 E7 E98 EM15 HR3 RA7 RA98 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1125; 04:07PM; WB 210 Fwy x Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AWfwWE; #Sylmar; First arriving LAFD ground crews have been able to stop forward progress of the three spot fires alongside the Foothill (I-210) Freeway between Bledsoe Street and Polk Street, at approximately one acre, and have released LAFD helicopters and Los Angeles County Fire Department / Angeles National Forest responders. No injury. No structures. No evacuation. LAFD personnel will remain at scene into this evening to check for hot spots and complete fire line control. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E287 E290 E298 E7 E75 E8 E8140 E90 E91 EM14 H4 H5 H6 HA4 HA5 HA6 RA91 T75 T87 T90 T98 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1125; 03:32PM; WB 210 Fwy x Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AWfwWE; #Sylmar; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response in a Mutual Threat Zone with the Los Angeles County Fire Department and Angeles National Forest Firefighters to an estimated one acre of vegetation burning in three spots alongside the Foothill (I-210) Freeway between Bledsoe Street and Polk Street. No imminent structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E287 E290 E298 E7 E75 E90 E91 EM14 H4 H5 H6 HA4 HA5 HA6 RA91 T75 T87 T90 T98 + LACoFD + Angeles NF; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0695; 11:17AM; Fryman Canyon Park; MAP: https://bit.ly/3aFHony; #StudioCity; LAFD ground and air response to an adult male hiker on a remote trail within Fryman Canyon Park, who sustained a fractured ankle. Local Weather at 11:55 AM PDT: Temp 91.6Â°F | No Wind | Humidity 48% | Sky Clear | Visibility 10 MI | Peak UV10.8 | A hovering LAFD rescue helicopter has lowered a Flight Paramedic to the victim, who is being stabilized and prepared to be hoisted aboard the hovering helicopter, for continuing in-flight care during direct transport to a regional hospital. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 H2 H6 HA2 HA6 RA76 RA90 RH214 T60; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 07/16/2022 INC#0592

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0592; 10:32AM; NB 101 Fwy x Hollywood Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oaFP3O; #Hollywood; LAFD Firefighters skillfully freed two seriously injured adult occupants from their overturned sedan, which came to rest overturned on the northbound Hollywood Boulevard onramp, after striking two light poles. Both patients (unknown age/ gender / medical condition / affiliation / circumstances) have been transported to a regional trauma center. #LATraffic: Closure of at least two lanes of the northbound Hollywood (US101) Freeway near Hollywood Boulevard, as well as the northbound US101 onramp at Hollywood Boulevard until CHP operations are complete. Motorists should anticipate congestion and delay in the area, and monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: CHP Central L.A. (Log #1097); FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E27 E35 E52 E6 E76 EM11 HR3 RA35 RA52 RA6 T27 T35 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0592; 10:10AM; NB 101 Fwy x Sunset Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oaFP3O; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Solo vehicle overturned, with two persons trapped.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E235 E35 E52 E6 E76 EM11 HR3 RA35 RA52 T35 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0220; 03:19AM; 15421 W Plummer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3c8ib5i; #NorthHills; PRELIM: 34 Firefighters took 39 minutes (3:58 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish an outside fire that extended to a 50' x 100' one-story corrugated metal automotive repair shop (undetermined business name). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E287 E290 E7 E90 RA75 RA87 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
